text: We are truly grateful for the wonderful care and dedication at Little Treasures Hougang. They create a warm and supportive environment where my child feels happy and safe. The school is spotless, and the freshly prepared meals are nutritious and well-balanced. Every staff member including principal is polite, humble, and always attentive to the children’s needs. We couldn’t have asked for a better place for our child’s early learning journey!

Our experience with Little Treasures Hougang has been fantastic. My son has grown more confident and has made significant improvements in his social skills since joining. The supportive environment and nurturing staff have made a huge difference.

Wonderful Preschool
Little Treasure child care has been amazing for our child. The teachers are kind and make learning fun. Our child enjoys going to school and has learned so much. The staff keeps us updated, and the school is clean and safe. We highly recommend to other parents!
All teachers are kind and helpful, my son is significantly improved communication with teachers and friends.
We are happy to send our child to school. All the teacher are very caring and helpful. Thank you teachers for your creative efforts.
